title: Grand Slam, French Open Men's Singles Results
text: May 28, 2018 / 1:24 AM / Updated 9 hours ago Grand Slam, French Open Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read May 28 (OPTA) - Results from the Grand Slam, French Open Men's Singles matches on Sunday .. 1st Round .. 8-David Goffin (BEL) beat Robin Haase (NED) 4-6 4-6 6-4 6-1 6-0 Corentin Moutet (FRA) beat Ivo Karlovic (CRO) 7-6(7) 6-2 7-6(5) Martin Klizan (SVK) beat Laslo Djere (SRB) 7-6(6) 4-6 7-6(6) 6-1 32-Gael Monfils (FRA) beat Elliot Benchetrit (FRA) 3-6 6-1 6-2 6-1 Federico Delbonis (ARG) beat Thomaz Bellucci (BRA) 6-1 6-3 3-6 6-1 10-Pablo Carreno Busta beat Jozef Kovalik (SVK) 4-6 6-1 7-5 (ESP) 7-6(5) 30-Fernando Verdasco (ESP) beat Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) 6-7(4) 6-4 6-3 6-7(3) 7-5 Guido Andreozzi (ARG) beat Taylor Fritz (USA) 6-7(4) 6-3 3-6 6-2 6-3 Jared Donaldson (USA) beat Nicolas Jarry (CHI) 6-3 4-6 3-6 6-3 6-4 4-Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) beat Mohamed Safwat (EGY) 6-1 6-4 7-6(1) Matteo Berrettini (ITA) beat Oscar Otte (GER) 3-6 7-5 6-2 6-1 19-Kei Nishikori (JPN) beat Maxime Janvier (FRA) 7-6(0) 6-4 6-3 15-Lucas Pouille (FRA) beat Daniil Medvedev (RUS) 6-2 6-3 6-4 26-Damir Dzumhur (BIH) beat Denis Kudla (USA) 6-4 6-2 6-2 Radu Albot (MDA) beat Gregoire Barrere (FRA) 4-6 0-6 7-5 6-1 6-2 2-Alexander Zverev (GER) beat Ricardas Berankis (LTU) 6-1 6-1 6-2
